bug.author: niboshi
bug.summary: Output is cluttered in static graph optimizations examples
bug.description:
Probably related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainer/issues/5451>#5451</denchmark-link> . Static graph feature prints debug logs to standard output. That interferes with progress bars. <denchmark-code>Device: @cupy:0 # Minibatch-size: 64 # epoch: 300
Using CIFAR10 dataset. end of build_schedule() Creating new backward schedule... end of build_schedule() epoch main/loss validation/main/loss main/accuracy validation/main/accuracy elapsed_time end of build_schedule().......................................] 0.30% end of build_schedule()#################################......] 89.60% 1 nan nan 0.0998042 0.100119 35.5823 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed after 30 days if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
This issue is closed as announced. Feel free to re-open it if needed.
